Superstring

Lyric video editor

file_download Free download

Superstring is a Mac & Windows app that lets you create lyric videos easily.

How it works

music_note

1. Drag a song

Select and drag a song that you want to create a lyric video into Superstring.

edit

2. Copy & paste lyrics

Copy & paste your lyrics. You can customize text styles, colors, fonts, and more.

crop_original

3. Align the timing

Align the timing of them by dragging. You can also customize background styles, colors, images and more.

public

4. Done!

Export your lyric video as a file and upload to YouTube. Share it with the world!

Express your music visually.

Superstring's innovative interface lets you launch and start editing in seconds. Creating a lyric video is as easy as dragging and dropping.

Everything in its place.

A simple, intuitive interface puts all the right tools in all the right places. Which makes it easy to choose a look and customize the texts, backgrounds, and effects.

Share your lyric video with the world!

You can export your lyric video as .mp4 file that you can upload to YouTube. You can also export your Superstring data as .superstring file that you can share with other users.

Made with Superstring

Superstring

Available for Mac and Windows.
